numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that family legacy impacts application status.
2. I notice that family income impacts application status.
3. I notice that students who have hard-working parents are more likely to be admitted.
4. I notice that these students are 2 times to 7 times more likely to be admitted.
5. I wonder how many students are in each income category.
6. The income categories are low income and medium income and high income.
7. If more students are recorded in the high-income category than in the low-income category then the data could change slightly.
8. I wonder how the data would change today.
9. I assume that the data was recorded more than 5 years ago.
10. I wonder how the data would change if it was recorded in the past 5 years.
11. This relates to my community.
12. My community has a wide range of incomes.
13. My community has many alumni families.
14. This makes admission more competitive for different students.
15. I go to a public school.
16. Some students go to private schools.
17. I know that students who go to private schools are very dedicated to their education.
18. I think that these students can afford to be dedicated to their education.
19. I wonder how many students came from public schools.
20. I wonder how many students came from private schools.
21. I ask whether family legacy and family income really impact application status.
